function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 related cyberchondria leading to increased sharing of unverified information","Impact":"Spread of misinformation, panic, and confusion related to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promote media literacy and critical thinking skills, fact-check information before sharing","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, fact-checking algorithms","People":"Individuals with cyberchondria, general public","Owner":"Public health organizations, educational institutions, social media platforms"}]}
